predictions.reasoning: She Bledsoe I’m Good has a loaded roster with Hurts and Taylor ready to blow up. The only thing evanras9 is rolling with is Josh Allen's indecisiveness. Good luck combating that!
Maxsauers13's Lamar Jackson and Saquon Barkley combo is too much for OTPHJSN's lackluster QB situation. Sorry Brock, hope you brought your A-game... oh wait, it’s a B-week!

DerekCal4 has a solid core with Daniels and Henderson. Hit it From the Dak is still figuring out how to hit the broad side of a barn with Prescott. Sorry, but you can't just throw to CeeDee every week!
DQBuquets9 boasts a powerhouse with Love, Jefferson, and Hill. If Kyler’s coming back—great—but you can't trust a QB still shaking off the rust against this firepower!
Schweiger14 has an elite setup with Stroud and McCaffrey. I mean, who are we kidding? Joe Burrow might be throwing to air this week.
TClark1742 is too stacked to lose, especially with Mahomes steering the ship. Baker Mayfield? Love the effort, but your playoff hopes might be locked in the doghouse on this one!

spicy_matchup.why: DerekCal4 could pull an upset against Hit it From the Dak; if Daniels connects early, he could light up the scoreboard faster than Dak can throw a pick. Don’t sleep on Marvin Harrison making some noise, folks!
